description: ## Overview Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion') due to an unspecified issue in the server optimizer. An attacker with high privileges can cause a denial of service by exploiting this vulnerability. ## Remediation Upgrade `mysql` to version 8.0.36, 8.2.1 or higher. ## References - [RedHat Bugzilla Bug](https://bugzilla.redhat.com/show_bug.cgi?id=2258782) - [Security Advisory](https://www.oracle.com/security-alerts/cpujan2024.html#AppendixMSQL)
remediation: Upgrade mysql to version 8.0.36, 8.2.1 or higher.
title: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion')

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion') due to an unspecified issue in the server optimizer. An attacker with high privileges can cause a denial of service by exploiting this vulnerability.
